title: The Great British Bake Off Zester Grater Tool for Zesting Lemon & More Micro Planer for Finely Grating Garlic, Ginger, Nutmeg, Parmesan, Chocolate etc, Stainless Steel, Blue, Large
features: FRESH FROM THE TENT: Official Great British Bake Off Zester as seen on the world's beloved baking show, designed in Great Britain

FINE GRATER - This must-have baking tool is unbeatable when it comes to fine grating and zesting. It easily handles nuts, chocolate, lemon, lime, citrus, parmesan, ginger, coconut, orange, nutmeg, cinnamon and garlic to create delectable flavour-rich bakes
SIGNATURE BAKE OFF COLOURS: Designed in the signature Duck Egg Blue palette that has become a fixture of GBBO, bring the tent to your kitchen with these complementary pastel tones
SAFE GRIP - The non-slip silicone grip of this hand held zester ensures stability whilst grating and allows for a safe angle adjustment

DISHWASHER SAFE: Baking can be messy, and we want you to dedicate your time to crafting the perfect buttercream rosette instead of slaving away at the sink. All of our bakeware and utensils are designed to be completely diswasher safe to reduce cleaning time
description: From the manufacturer Preparation is the science behind the baking, where all the magic is truly held! Having quality equipment isn't essential for a good baker, but it can make your job a whole lot easier. Our soft handled preparation utensils are designed for comfortable baking prep. From our robust stainless steel balloon whisks to our silicone bowl scrapers, our utensils are designed to withstand extensive baking prep with comfort at the forefront of design. Elevating your bakes all starts with the pallette knife. The foundational tool of a show stopping bake, our angled pallette knife is designed in stainless steel with a soft touch plastic handle for creating an even finish on your icing at complex angles. The ultimate partner for our Bake Off cake stand and piping nozzles, our cake decorating tools are perfect for those with a passion for elevating the visuals of their bakes. In the Bake Off tent, flavour will always ultimately trump design. A vital tool for flavouring your crumb is our stainless steel Lemon Zester. Fitted with a soft-touch silicone handle to facilitate strenuous zesting jobs, our Zester employs micro planing technology to facilitate a variety of food groups. From citrus fruits, to chocolate, to tough foods like ginger and garlic, this 30cm Zesting tool is designed to accommodate the whole range of flavour enhancing ingredients. You've planned the perfect recipe, flavoured it with the finesse of a Star Baker, and poured hours of innovation into your decoration, now it's time to present. Our foldable Cake Stand in the signature Duck Egg Blue is the perfect option for someone who bakes on the move. Constructed in two parts to be easily stored away and embossed with the Official GBBO logo, our cake stand is contructed in self-regenerating bamboo to make it simultaneously light weight and non porus for quick and simple clean-up!
